Key Match Events: Ireland recovered from 32-6 to almost achieve a remarkable win
Gareth Delany's 31 off 19 led the comeback
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland's bowlers gave Pakistan a scare
Ireland bowed out of the tournament with a spirited performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland's batters were stunned by Pakistan's seamers
A partnership of 44 for the seventh wicket between Gareth Delany and Mark Adair saved Ireland from their lowest score in T20I cricket
Ireland's bowlers kept their side in the contest
Others: The match was part of the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup
Ireland was unable to advance to the Super 8 stage of the competition
The match was played in Lauderhill, Florida, USA
